metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20240 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in gdk-pixbuf in versions before 2.42.0. An integer wraparound leading to an out of bounds write can occur when a crafted GIF image is loaded. An attacker may cause applications to crash or could potentially execute code on the victim system. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: gdk-pixbuf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
